DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: A Novel Competitive Quantum-Behaviour Evolutionary Multi-Swarm Optimizer Algorithm Based on CUDA Architecture Applied to Constrained Engineering Design
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: A Novel Competitive Quantum-Behaviour Evolutionary Multi-Swarm Optimizer Algorithm Based on CUDA Architecture Applied to Constrained Engineering Design

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.ORGANIZADORES: Marco Dorigo, Mauro Birattari, Simon Garnier, Heiko Hamann, Marco Montes de Oca, Christine Solnon, Thomas Stützle

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper presents a new bio-inspired algorithm named Competitive Quantum-Behaviour Evolutionary Multi-Swarm Optimization (CQEMSO) based on CUDA parallel architecture applied to solve engineering problems, using the concept of master/slave swarm working under a competitive scheme and being executed over the paradigm of General Purpose Computing on Graphics Processing Units (GPGPU). The efforts on implementing the CQEMSO algorithm are focused at generating a solution which includes greater quality of search and higher speed of convergence by using mechanisms of evolutionary strategies with the procedures of search and optimization found in the classic QPSO. For performance analysis, the proposed solution was submitted to some well-known engineering problems (WBD, DPV) and its results compared to other solutions found on scientific literature.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper presents a new bio-inspired algorithm named Competitive Quantum-Behaviour Evolutionary Multi-Swarm Optimization (CQEMSO) based on CUDA parallel architecture applied to solve engineering problems, using the concept of master/slave swarm working under a competitive scheme and being executed over the paradigm of General Purpose Computing on Graphics Processing Units (GPGPU). The efforts on implementing the CQEMSO algorithm are focused at generating a solution which includes greater quality of search and higher speed of convergence by using mechanisms of evolutionary strategies with the procedures of search and optimization found in the classic QPSO. For performance analysis, the proposed solution was submitted to some well-known engineering problems (WBD, DPV) and its results compared to other solutions found on scientific literature.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: An Estimation of Distribution Algorithms Applied to Sequence Pattern Mining
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: An Estimation of Distribution Algorithms Applied to Sequence Pattern Mining

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO: Innovations in Computing Sciences and Software Engineering

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper presents a proposal of distribution’s estimated algorithm to the extraction of sequential patterns in a database which use a probabilistic model based on graphs which represent the relations among items that form a sequence. The model maps a probability among the items allowing them to adjust the model during the execution of the algorithm using the evolution process of EDA, optimizing the candidate’s generation of solution and extracting a group of sequential patterns optimized.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper presents a proposal of distribution’s estimated algorithm to the extraction of sequential patterns in a database which use a probabilistic model based on graphs which represent the relations among items that form a sequence. The model maps a probability among the items allowing them to adjust the model during the execution of the algorithm using the evolution process of EDA, optimizing the candidate’s generation of solution and extracting a group of sequential patterns optimized.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: A New Cooperative Evolutionary Multi-Swarm Optimizer Algorithm Based on CUDA Architecture Applied to Engineering Optimization
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: A New Cooperative Evolutionary Multi-Swarm Optimizer Algorithm Based on CUDA Architecture Applied to Engineering Optimization

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper presents a new Cooperative Evolutionary Multi-Swarm Optimization Algorithm (CEMSO-GPU) based on CUDA parallel architecture applied to solve engineering problems. The focus of this approach is: the use of the concept of master/slave swarm with a mechanism of data sharing; and, the parallelism method based on the paradigm of General Purpose Computing on Graphics Processing Units (GPGPU) with CUDA architecture, brought by NVIDIA corporation. All these improvements were made aiming to produce better solutions in fewer iterations of the algorithm and to improve the search for best results. The algorithm was tested for some well-known engineering problems (WBD, ATD, MWTCS, SRD-11) and the results compared to other approaches.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper presents a new Cooperative Evolutionary Multi-Swarm Optimization Algorithm (CEMSO-GPU) based on CUDA parallel architecture applied to solve engineering problems. The focus of this approach is: the use of the concept of master/slave swarm with a mechanism of data sharing; and, the parallelism method based on the paradigm of General Purpose Computing on Graphics Processing Units (GPGPU) with CUDA architecture, brought by NVIDIA corporation. All these improvements were made aiming to produce better solutions in fewer iterations of the algorithm and to improve the search for best results. The algorithm was tested for some well-known engineering problems (WBD, ATD, MWTCS, SRD-11) and the results compared to other approaches.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: Analyzing Genetic Algorithm with Game Theory and Adjusted Crossover Approach on Engineering Problems
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Analyzing Genetic Algorithm with Game Theory and Adjusted Crossover Approach on Engineering Problems

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO: Advances in Intelligent Systems and Computing
DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.ORGANIZADORES: Ajith Abraham, Sang Yong Han, Salah A. Al-Sharhan, Hongbo Liu

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
This paper has the purpose to show game theory (GT) applied to genetic
algorithms (GA) as a new type of interaction between individuals of GA. The game
theory increases the exploration potential of the genetic algorithm by changing the
fitness with social interaction between individuals, avoiding the algorithm to fall in
a local optimum. To increase the exploitation potential of this approach, this work
will present the adjusted crossover operator and compare results to other crossover
methods.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
This paper has the purpose to show game theory (GT) applied to genetic
algorithms (GA) as a new type of interaction between individuals of GA. The game
theory increases the exploration potential of the genetic algorithm by changing the
fitness with social interaction between individuals, avoiding the algorithm to fall in
a local optimum. To increase the exploitation potential of this approach, this work
will present the adjusted crossover operator and compare results to other crossover
methods.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: Clustering Aluminum Smelting Potlines Using Fuzzy C-Means and K-Means Algorithms
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Clustering Aluminum Smelting Potlines Using Fuzzy C-Means and K-Means Algorithms

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Aluminum smelting potlines usually have a big number of cells, producing aluminum in a
continuous and complex process. Analytical monitoring is essential to increase the
industries’ competitive advantage, however, during their operation, some cells share similar
behaviors, therefore forming clusters of cells. These clusters rely on data patterns that are
usually implicit or invisible to operation, but can be found by means data analysis. In this
work we present two clustering techniques (Fuzzy C-Means and K-Means) to find and
cluster the cells that present similar behaviors. The benefits of clustering are mainly in the
simplification of potline analysis, since a large number of cells can be summarized in one
single cluster, which can provide richer but compacted information for control and
modelling.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: Evaluation of the competitiveness of organizations: An essay using Artificial Neural Networks (ANN)
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Evaluation of the competitiveness of organizations: An essay using Artificial Neural Networks (ANN)

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO: Advances in Intelligent Systems and Robotics
DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.ORGANIZADORES: Torres, G.L.; Abe, J.M.; Mucheroni, M.L.; Cruvinel, P.E.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Artificial Neural Networks are universal approximators with vast application in the areas of control systems and of decision support, being constituted in an important area of research of the computational intelligence. It comes a essay being used Artificial Neural Networks in the evaluation of the competitiveness of organizations in a context die. They are considered: a) the importance of the periodic evaluation of the competitiveness of the organization face to the turbulent environment of the contemporary organizations; b) proposal of a model of evaluation of competitiveness of organizations using Artificial Neural Networks Direct Multi-layer; and c) implementation of the model and the results obtained for a organization scenery die supplied.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Artificial Neural Networks are universal approximators with vast application in the areas of control systems and of decision support, being constituted in an important area of research of the computational intelligence. It comes a essay being used Artificial Neural Networks in the evaluation of the competitiveness of organizations in a context die. They are considered: a) the importance of the periodic evaluation of the competitiveness of the organization face to the turbulent environment of the contemporary organizations; b) proposal of a model of evaluation of competitiveness of organizations using Artificial Neural Networks Direct Multi-layer; and c) implementation of the model and the results obtained for a organization scenery die supplied.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: Simulations on The Bath Chemistry Variables Using Neural Networks
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Simulations on The Bath Chemistry Variables Using Neural Networks

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: In this work we present a single layer neural network based model for bath chemistry variables in the aluminum smelting process. This model is designed to be simulated with real data as if it worked online in parallel with the process. The model is built using a very fast machine learning algorithm, the Extreme Learning Machines, which provides excellent results in regression problems in a very short time. Also we applied statistical analysis for data collection, preprocessing and filtering and for validation we performed several simulations to attest the neural model’s capability to respond to new data. A comparison of this model against linear and traditional nonlinear structures is performed to show how single layer neural networks can be applied on the bath chemistry modeling.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In this work we present a single layer neural network based model for bath chemistry variables in the aluminum smelting process. This model is designed to be simulated with real data as if it worked online in parallel with the process. The model is built using a very fast machine learning algorithm, the Extreme Learning Machines, which provides excellent results in regression problems in a very short time. Also we applied statistical analysis for data collection, preprocessing and filtering and for validation we performed several simulations to attest the neural model’s capability to respond to new data. A comparison of this model against linear and traditional nonlinear structures is performed to show how single layer neural networks can be applied on the bath chemistry modeling.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: A MIMO Modeling Strategy for Bath Chemistry
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: A MIMO Modeling Strategy for Bath Chemistry

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The bath chemistry is very complex for analytical modeling due to its sensitivity to disturbances from other processes. The control of the electrolyte also represents a great challenge, provided that any change in the heat and mass balance may affect current efficiency and pot life. In order to test a good control strategy, a process model is very helpful. The model allows process experts to design and test process control strategies without compromising reduction cells. In addition a model allows simulations on the process for a long time. In this work we developed a neural-based strategy to model bath chemistry variables in a Multiple Input Multiple Output (MIMO) approach using a data-driven design. The achieved results are very acceptable for the process engineering staff of the industry where this work was performed.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The bath chemistry is very complex for analytical modeling due to its sensitivity to disturbances from other processes. The control of the electrolyte also represents a great challenge, provided that any change in the heat and mass balance may affect current efficiency and pot life. In this work we developed a neural-based strategy to model bath chemistry variables in a Multiple Input Multiple Output (MIMO) approach using a data-driven design. The achieved results are very acceptable for the process engineering staff of the industry where this work was performed.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: Retroviral Iterative Genetic Algorithm for Real Parameter Function Optimization Problems
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Retroviral Iterative Genetic Algorithm for Real Parameter Function Optimization Problems

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.ORGANIZADORES: Cai Z.; Hu C.; Kang Z.; Liu Y.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper describes the development of a new hybrid meta-heuristic of optimization based on a viral lifecycle, specifically the retroviruses (the nature’s swiftest evolvers’), called Retroviral Iterative Genetic Algorithm (RIGA). This algorithm uses Genetics Algorithms (GA) structures with features of retroviral replication, providing a great genetic diversity, confirmed by better results achieved by RIGA comparing with GA applied to some Real-Valued Benchmarking Functions.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper describes the development of a new hybrid meta-heuristic of optimization based on a viral lifecycle, specifically the retroviruses (the nature’s swiftest evolvers’), called Retroviral Iterative Genetic Algorithm (RIGA). This algorithm uses Genetics Algorithms (GA) structures with features of retroviral replication, providing a great genetic diversity, confirmed by better results achieved by RIGA comparing with GA applied to some Real-Valued Benchmarking Functions.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: A Fuzzy Intelligent Controller for Genetic Algorithms¿ Parameters
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: A Fuzzy Intelligent Controller for Genetic Algorithms¿ Parameters

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.ORGANIZADORES: Jiao L.; Wang L.; Gao X.; Liu J.; Wu F.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Genetic Algorithms have been successful in several practical appliances and obtained great prominence among the techniques of Evolutionary Computation. A large portion of methods and parameters adopted in its use are heuristic or random choices, which remain unchanged throughout the execution once they are set. This can lead to a certain lack of exploration of the search surface and also compromise the variability of the population. For that matter, this work introduces the implementation of an intelligent agent based on fuzzy logic, enabling dynamic monitoring and regulation of six GA parameters. The results obtained surpass the GA traditional implementation in many aspects, and open a wide new space for research and study.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Genetic Algorithms have been successful in several practical appliances and obtained great prominence among the techniques of Evolutionary Computation. A large portion of methods and parameters adopted in its use are heuristic or random choices, which remain unchanged throughout the execution once they are set. For that matter, this work introduces the implementation of an intelligent agent based on fuzzy logic, enabling dynamic monitoring and regulation of six GA parameters. The results obtained surpass the GA traditional implementation in many aspects, and open a wide new space for research and study.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: Estimation of Aluminium Fluoride Concentration in Aluminium Reduction Cells through a Soft Sensors Approach
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Estimation of Aluminium Fluoride Concentration in Aluminium Reduction Cells through a Soft Sensors Approach

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.ORGANIZADORES: Yin H.; Costa J.A.F.; Barreto G.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This work exploits a model for Aluminium Fluoride Concentration Measurement in the Aluminium Smelting process. This process variable is usually measured every 50-100 hours since it requires long laboratory analysis. This variable has a strong influence on the whole process, thus it should be controlled in a shorter basis. In order to prevent the long time between measurements, we developed a soft sensor based on neural networks which allows estimating the fluoride concentration at any moment by querying against the available process database. This database encompasses the consolidated knowledge on this chemical process and thus can be used both to build and validate the model.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This work exploits a model for Aluminium Fluoride Concentration Measurement in the Aluminium Smelting process. This process variable is usually measured every 50-100 hours since it requires long laboratory analysis. This variable has a strong influence on the whole process, thus it should be controlled in a shorter basis. In order to prevent the long time between measurements, we developed a soft sensor based on neural networks which allows estimating the fluoride concentration at any moment by querying against the available process database. This database encompasses the consolidated knowledge on this chemical process and thus can be used both to build and validate the model.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: Network Intrusion Detection System Using Data Mining
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Network Intrusion Detection System Using Data Mining

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO: Communications in Computer and Information Science
DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.ORGANIZADORES: Jayne C.; Yue S.; Iliadis L.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Atividades dos serviços de tecnologia da informação

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The aim of this study is to simulate a network traffic analyzer that is part of an Intrusion Detection System - IDS, the main focus of research is data mining and for this type of application the steps that precede the data mining : data preparation (possibly involving cleaning data, data transformations, selecting subsets of records, data normalization) are considered fundamental for a good performance of the classifiers during the data mining stage. In this context, this paper discusses and presents as a contribution not only the classifiers that were used in the problem of intrusion detection, but also the initial stage of data preparation. Therefore, we tested the performance of three classifiers on the KDDCUP’99 benchmark intrusion detection dataset and selected the best classifiers. We initially tested a Decision Tree and a Neural Network using this dataset, suggesting improvements by reducing the number of attributes from 42 to 27 considering only two classes of detection, normal and intrusion. Finally, we tested the Decision Tree and Bayesian Network classifiers considering five classes of attack: Normal, DOS, U2R, R2L and Probing. The experimental results proved that the algorithms used achieved high detection rates (DR) and significant reduction of false positives (FP) for different types of network intrusions using limited computational resources.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: Soft Sensor for Fluoridated Alumina Inference in Gas Treatment Centers
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Soft Sensor for Fluoridated Alumina Inference in Gas Treatment Centers

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.ORGANIZADORES: Yin H.; Costa J.A.F.; Barreto G.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The Gas Treatment Center performs a key role in the aluminum smelting process, since it strongly influences the chemical and thermal stability of the electrolytic bath through fluoridated alumina. Therefore this variable should be considered to keep the bath chemistry under control. However, the fluorine concentration measurement in fluoridated alumina is very time-consuming and that information becomes available only after a while. By using Artificial Neural Network we developed a Soft Sensor capable to estimate the fluorine concentration in fluoridated alumina, and to provide that information to plant engineers in a timely manner. This paper discusses the methodology used and the results of an implemented Soft Sensor using Neural Networks on fluorine estimation in fluoridated alumina from a Gas Treatment Center in an important Brazilian Aluminum Smelter.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The Gas Treatment Center performs a key role in the aluminum smelting process, since it strongly influences the chemical and thermal stability of the electrolytic bath through fluoridated alumina. Therefore this variable should be considered to keep the bath chemistry under control. However, the fluorine concentration measurement in fluoridated alumina is very time-consuming and that information becomes available only after a while. By using Artificial Neural Network we developed a Soft Sensor capable to estimate the fluorine concentration in fluoridated alumina, and to provide that information to plant engineers in a timely manner. This paper discusses the methodology used and the results of an implemented Soft Sensor using Neural Networks on fluorine estimation in fluoridated alumina from a Gas Treatment Center in an important Brazilian Aluminum Smelter.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: Dynamic Neural Nets in the State Space Utilized in Non-Linear Process Identification
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Dynamic Neural Nets in the State Space Utilized in Non-Linear Process Identification

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO: Artificial Neural Nets and Genetic Algorithms

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This work shows the use of a novel neural model for identification of non-linear process. The neural model make use of internal dynamic with dynamical neurons. The parameters responsible for the dynamic of the neural net are adjustable, giving a high flexibility for the neural model in process identification.

The parameters responsible for the dynamic of the neural net are adjustable, giving a high flexibility for the neural model in process identification.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: Métodos de Extracción de Características en el ECG: Análisis Comparativo
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Métodos de Extracción de Características en el ECG: Análisis Comparativo

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: ECG feature extraction plays a significant role in diagnosing most of the cardiac diseases. In this paper, a com- parison between three ECG feature extraction methods is presented. The methods are: Linear Principal Components Analysis (PCA), Discrete Cosine Transformation (DCT) and Kernel Principal Components Analysis (KPCA). A Multilayer Perceptron is used as a gold classifier combined with the three methods before. The beats used for training and validation of the three combinations are extracted from twelve MIT – BIH Arrhythmia Database records. The performance of the three combinations is discussed and a simple execution time is evaluated.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: ECG feature extraction plays a significant role in diagnosing most of the cardiac diseases. In this paper, a com- parison between three ECG feature extraction methods is presented. The methods are: Linear Principal Components Analysis (PCA), Discrete Cosine Transformation (DCT) and Kernel Principal Components Analysis (KPCA). A Multilayer Perceptron is used as a gold classifier combined with the three methods before. The beats used for training and validation of the three combinations are extracted from twelve MIT – BIH Arrhythmia Database records. The performance of the three combinations is discussed and a simple execution time is evaluated.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: Generador de Señales Electrocardiográficas con Morfologías Múltiples
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Generador de Señales Electrocardiográficas con Morfologías Múltiples

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: In this paper is presented, a computational tool, to generate (in a controlled way) multiple morphologies of quasi-artificial electrocardiogram (ECG) beats, starting from the configuration and concatenation of six (6) default segments of an ECG beat. The tool allows: to add noises and line base drifts, to convolve the signal with up to three mathematical functions, and to introduce artefacts in any time position of a beat. The tool could be used for the training and evaluation of ECG patterns classifiers such as neural networks (NN), support vector machines (SVM) and others based on Artificial Intelligence techniques.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In this paper is presented, a computational tool, to generate (in a controlled way) multiple morphologies of quasi-artificial electrocardiogram (ECG) beats, starting from the configuration and concatenation of six (6) default segments of an ECG beat. The tool allows: to add noises and line base drifts, to convolve the signal with up to three mathematical functions, and to introduce artefacts in any time position of a beat. The tool could be used for the training and evaluation of ECG patterns classifiers such as neural networks (NN), support vector machines (SVM) and others based on Artificial Intelligence techniques.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: Fuzzy Control Applied to Aluminum Smelting
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Fuzzy Control Applied to Aluminum Smelting

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO: Fuzzy Logic - Controls, Concepts, Theories and Applications

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Eletrônica Industrial, Sistemas e Controles Eletrônicos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Aluminum is a modern and new metal, since it has been produced for industry no earlier
than 1886, when Hall and Héroult concurrently found out a method to produce free
Aluminum through electrolysis (Beck, 2008). In 1900, the Aluminum production worldwide
had reached a thousand tons. Nevertheless, at the beginning of the 21st century, global
production reached 32 million tons encompassed by 24 million of primary Aluminum and 8
million of recycled material. This fact puts Aluminum at the second place in the list of the
most used metals on earth. The world without Aluminum became inacceptable: the
businessmen, the tourists, the delivery offices fly over the world in airplanes made of
Aluminum, as well as many enterprises and industries are strongly dependent of this metal.
This metal has contributed to low fuel consumption in cars and trucks, as well as allowing
high speeds for trains and ships due to their weight reduction. Since it is a light metal,
Aluminum eases the construction of buildings resistant to corrosion and low need for
maintenance. Everywhere in the world, the electricity transmission lines for great distances
are made of Aluminum, in part or whole. Food quality is preserved by Aluminum packages,
reducing waste and giving comfort to users. This metal protects food, cosmetics and
pharmaceutical products from ultraviolet rays, bad smells and bacteria. Food waste is
avoided 30% when Aluminum packages are used.
Aluminum is a global commodity; its industry employs directly at least one million people,
and indirectly more than four million. It is a slight compact industry, provided that around 20 smelters are responsible for 65% or world production. Most companies work only with
Aluminum, but 20% of them work with Aluminum with other metals or mines. Half of
Aluminum production is done by companies vertically integrated, from bauxite mining to
metal recycling (IAI, 2010).
For all these reasons, the Aluminum can be considered a highly imp

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-2.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Eletrônica Industrial, Sistemas e Controles Eletrônicos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O presente software tem por objetivo controlar de supervisionar o processo de automação, supervisão e controle das balanças dosadorase e dos misturadores elicoidais da Fábrica de Anodo Verde Fase II da ALBRAS (FAV II), o qual foi batizado como SISFAVII (Sistema de Supervisão e Controle da Fábrica de Anodo Verde Fase II). Este novo sistema de supervisão e controle é baseado num microcomputador que executa uma software SCADA (Supervisão controle e Aquisição de dados), adquirido pela empresa Albras para executar seus desenvolvimentos, chamado GENESIS for windows .De acordo com a operação descrita nos procedimentos operacionais da Fav II, foram desenvolvidas interfaces amigáveis usuário-computador para operar em tempo real fazendo a supervisão e o controle dos dispositivos operantes. Entre as metas a alcançadas com este software, destaca-se o munitoramento e registro de parâmetros de controle, bem como a obtenção de um modelo mais flexivel de ajuste. Este sistema também emitirá relatórios periódicos que poderão servir inicialmente como meios de comprovação e aprovação da eficásia do sistema projetado. Este software foi financiado pela empresa Albras que é proprietária do mesmo.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-SOFTWARE.TITULO-DO-SOFTWARE: SISCMFAVII - Sistema de Supervisão e Controle dos Misturadores da Fábrica de Anodo Verde II da Albras

DETALHAMENTO-DO-SOFTWARE.FINALIDADE: Supervisionar e Controlar em tempo os dois misturadores L17 e L24 da fábrida de anodo verde II da Albras (Alumínio Brasileiro S/A)

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O presente software tem por objetivo controlar e supervisionar o processo dos misturadores elicoidais da Fábrica de Anodo Verde Fase II da ALBRAS (FAV II), o qual foi batizado como SISCMFAVII (Sistema de Supervisão e Controle dos Misturadores da Fábrica de Anodo Verde Fase II). Este novo sistema de supervisão e controle é baseado num microcomputador que executa uma software SCADA (Supervisão controle e Aquisição de dados), adquirido pela empresa Albras para executar seus desenvolvimentos, chamado GENESIS for windows .De acordo com a operação descrita nos procedimentos operacionais da Fav II, foram desenvolvidas interfaces amigáveis usuário-computador para operar em tempo real fazendo a supervisão e o controle dos misturadores elicoidais L17 e L24. Entre as metas a alcançadas com este software, destaca-se o munitoramento e registro de parâmetros de controle, bem como a obtenção de um modelo mais flexivel de ajuste. Este sistema também emitirá relatórios periódicos que poderão servir inicialmente como meios de comprovação e aprovação da eficácia do sistema projetado, sendo o mesmo o único sistema de controle de misturadores baseados na plataforma Windons na industria de alumínio do mundo. Este software foi financiado pela empresa Albras que é proprietária do mesmo.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
O objetivo deste documento é descrever as funções do sistema de controle das cubas de redução de alumínio da fábrica da Albras em Barcarena-PA, abordando como temas principais: o sistema de alimentação e o controle de resistência.
Uma abordagem sucinta é realizada sobre a forma de aquisição de dados do sistema. As formas de alimentação serão abordadas de forma mais expansiva, pela sua grande importância na estabilidade das cubas e consequentemente o controle de resitência também terá importância na descrição do documento.
Este documento torna-se necessário pela ausência de uma referência bibliográfica que informe aos técnicos de processos e de automação, da área de Redução/Fundição da Albras, a situação atual do sistema de controle da estabilidade das cubas de redução.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Produção e Distribuição de Energia Elétrica

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Dentro do atual cenário do sistema elétrico nacional, em que o consumo de energia elétrica aumenta dia a dia, necessitando-se de novos e urgentes investimentos em geração e transmissão, aumenta cada vez mais a importância da manutenção preditiva (procedimentos que visam diminuir as paradas desnecessárias de máquinas geradoras de energia elétrica e equipamentos de transmissão). Esta metodologia consiste na medição de diversos parâmetros tradicionalmente indicadores do estado operativo dos equipamentos, cujos valores medidos e/ou sua variação podem indicar se o equipamento está funcionando normalmente, se existe a possibilidade de apresentar falhas. Assim é possível saber quando deverá ser programada junto ao ONS uma parada para manutenção. 
O projeto objetiva essencialmente:
a)	Medir com segurança as grandezas fornecidas pelos sensores de vibração, temperatura, pressão, referência de posição, potência e outras variáveis envolvidas em compensadores síncronos da Eletronorte.
b)	Desenvolver um software para análise dos sinais medidos, incorporando alarmes que dão indicações imediatas aos operadores. 
c)	Disponibilizar informações contínuas aos operadores, pessoal de manutenção e aos analistas em vibração em através da rede corporativa de computadores da Eletronorte. módulos que permitam a análise remota dos sinais monitorados
d)	Implementar uma sistemática de alarme, armazenamento em banco de dados e gerenciamento das informações recebidas pelos sistema de monitoração.
e) Desenvolver e implementar módulos de auxilio ao diagnóstico de falhas utilizando algoritmos que combinem as vantagens fornecidas pela lógica fuzzy e pelos sistemas especialistas, aplicados a um compensador síncrono.

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-ORIENTACOES-CONCLUIDAS-.TITULO: Desenvolvimento de um Sistema de Supervisão e Controle para uma Planta Industrial

DETALHAMENTO-DE-ORIENTACOES-CONCLUIDAS-P.NOME-DA-AGENCIA: Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Eletrônica Industrial, Sistemas e Controles Eletrônicos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Este trabalho apresenta o estudo realizado para projetar e desenvolver um sistema pioneiro de supervisão e controle para um planta industrial, baseado em computador. O ambiente fabril da ALBRÁS (Alumínio Brasileiro S.A.) serviu de base para estudo, mais especificamente o sistema de dosagem e mistura da Fábrica de Anodo Verde - Fase II. Um software que provê uma solução SCADA (Supervisão e Controle de Aquisição de Dados), chamano GENESIS for Windows, foi utilizado para implementação do referido sistema. Este software apresenta diversas ferramentas para desenvolvimento de sistemas de supervisão e controle industriais.
 O trabalho envolve aspectos relativos à identificação de processos, implementação de sistemas de controle baseado em técnicas clássicas e processamento de sinais. O sistema implementado provê uma atualização do processo hoje existente n Fábrica de Anodo Verde da ALBRÁS, já automatizado, porém de difícil operação. O sistema foi projetado a partir de dados de operação atual da fábrica e servirá de base para futuros trabalhos a serem desenvolvidos na modernização de sua automação.
 Com base em uma nova filosofia de gerência de informação, este sistema foi projetado para operar a partir de um computador, constituindo-se de um módulo de supervisão, através de interfaces gráficas usuário-computador de fácil entendimento e manipulação, e de um módulo de controle construído para operar em tempo real junto ao processo, utilizando modernos dispositivos de interfaceamento.

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-ORIENTACOES-CONCLUIDAS-.TITULO: Supervisão e Controle Industrial dos Misturadores de Pasta Anódica e Compactadora da Fábrica de Anodo Verde da Albras

PALAVRAS-CHAVE.PALAVRA-CHAVE-2: Supervisão e Controle em Tempo real

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-2.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Eletrônica Industrial, Sistemas e Controles Eletrônicos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Este trabalho apresenta o desenvolvimento e a implementação de um sistema de supervisão e controle para plantas industriais. Quanto à implementação do referido sistema, a Albrás (Alumínio Brasileiro S/A) disponibilizou seu ambiente fabril, mais especificamente o sistema de mistura e compactação da Fábrica de Anodo Verde II – FAV II. Para o sistema de mistura foram implementados o controle automático e o sistema de supervisão, o sistema de compactação ganhou um sistema de supervisão. Um software SCADA (Supervisão, Controle e Aquisição de Dados), chamado Genesis32, foi utilizado para a implementação dos sistemas de supervisão dos dois processos. O controle foi desenvolvido em linguagem LADDER, que por sua vez é a linguagem de programação dos Controladores Lógicos Programáveis – CLP. O CLP utilizado é o CLP série 5 da Allen Bradley.
	O controle dos misturadores atua na corrente do motor CC, que aciona o eixo dos misturadores. A lógica de controle foi baseada no valor de bandas limites estipulados pelos Engenheiros de Processo da empresa.
	No sistema de supervisão a animação desenvolvida nas interfaces usuário-computador provém de sinalizações provenientes do processo, em tempo real.
	O sistema implementado provê uma atualização do processo hoje existente na Fábrica de Anodo Verde II da Albrás, já automatizado, mas de difícil operação. O sistema foi projetado a partir de dados da operação atual da fábrica e servirá de base para futuros trabalhos a serem desenvolvidos na modernização de sua automação.
